about_the_game:
A set that includes an additional scenario and events that can be played with "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Added scenario
The Wavering Han Dynasty

Background:
Shortly after the Yellow Turban Rebellion ended, revolts occurred against the Han Dynasty one after another, and warlords were in a rush to suppress them. In Liang Province, Han Sui rebelled against Dong Zhuo and his men. In You Province, the army that Zhang Chun raised had been placed in check by Liu Yu and Gongsun Zan. In Changsha, after defeating Ou Xing, Sun Jian was establishing a foothold. Meanwhile, at the palace, He Jin and the Ten Eunuchs were spending all of their time on political infighting.

▼Added events
"Death of Emperor Ling", "Plot to Eliminate the Eunuchs", "Turmoil in the Imperial Capital", "Plot to Assassinate Dong Zhuo", and "Cao Cao Raises an Army"

Overview:
The events depict the chaos within the Han Dynasty, such as the political strife between He Jin and the Ten Eunuchs, the tyranny of Dong Zhuo, and more.

Note: Events also occur in other scenarios.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 Display required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch Surround, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 Display recommended

oflc.descriptors: Mild themes, Violence and coarse language

short_description: With the fall of Zhang Jiao， the Yellow Turban Rebellion ended， but revolts occurred against the Han across the land. However， at the palace， He Jin and the Ten Eunuchs spent all of their time on political infighting.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean, English
*languages with full audio support
